channel.title: [Req]OgreIsland Miner
channel.description:
Its a dumb little game lol i was just wondering if someone could create a miner for it... all it would have to do is click one color... game has no randoms no macroing detection system either so it can be extremly basic... and it needs to wait like 5 seconds between clicks... if you can make it so i can adjust the time that would be even better... game is at ogreisland.com
Tyvm, Shawrty

tyvm i wish i could right scripts glad you added the pick color and the wait time that i could change

item.title: [Req]OgreIsland Miner
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

[php]
program OgreIslandMiner;

// F12 Stops the Script

Const
RockColor = 0; //Use the color pick to select the color of your rock.
Waittime = 1; //How long to wait before clicking again in Seconds.

Var
x, y, x1, x2, y1, y2: Integer;

Procedure Mine;
Begin
If(FindColorSpiral(x, y, RockColor, x1, y1, x2, y2))then
Begin
MoveMouse(x, y);
Wait(200);
ClickMouse(x, y, True);
Wait(WaitTime * 1000);
end;
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
Wait(100);
GetClientDimensions(x2, y2);
x1 := 0;
y1 := 0;
Repeat
Mine;
Until(IsFKeyDown(12));
end.
[/php]

Thats the most basic of all scripts. Have fun

Read full topic
